title: Black Moon Lilith in Cancer: A Complete Guide

steps.title: You’re maternal and nurturing.
steps.content: You’re maternal and nurturing. Warm and caring Cancer is the mother of the Zodiac. [1] X Research source If you have a Cancer Lilith, you have a special gift for understanding others' needs, and you love to take care of people. This can be a positive thing, but Lilith also represents the shadow side of these traits. For example, you may overextend yourself to care for others, and then get frustrated when they don’t go to the same lengths for you. [2] X Research source How to thrive : Taking care of others can be a beautiful thing, but not when it comes at your own expense. Prioritize self-care to avoid burnout. Take a relaxing bubble bath, then watch a marathon of your favorite movies. Or, take a peaceful hike in nature to reset. Whatever your heart desires! Be sure to tell your loved ones that you won’t be available for this period. This time is just for you, to show yourself the love and care you show to others.

steps.title: You’re extremely empathetic.
steps.content: You’re extremely empathetic. Ruled by the moon, Cancers are known for being sensitive. They’re very in touch with their own emotions and the emotions of others. [3] X Research source If your Lilith is in Cancer, you likely feel others’ pain deeply, and you tend to take it on as if it were your own. You might find yourself rushing to the rescue when loved ones need help, even when you don’t have the time or space to do so. [4] X Research source How to thrive : Your empathy is your superpower, but when you give it free rein, it can become toxic , leading to imbalanced relationships where you give far more than you get. Learn to set healthy boundaries to avoid this. This could mean not answering phone calls after 10:00 p.m., or not dropping important tasks when a friend asks you to come over for emotional support. Whatever boundaries you decide, do your best to stick to them. Remember, you can’t be everything to everyone at all times, and that’s okay!

steps.title: You desire safety and security, but you don’t want to seem needy.
steps.content: You desire safety and security, but you don’t want to seem needy. Lilith deals with the inner wounds that shape your desires. If your Lilith is in Cancer, you may have felt neglected or unsupported emotionally when you were growing up. As a result, familial support is all more dear to you in adulthood. [5] X Research source Your deepest desire is to feel taken care of by loved ones, but you’re afraid of coming across as needy or dependent. How to thrive : Take steps to be more vulnerable with the people closest to you, whether this be your actual family unit, or a friend group that has become your chosen family. Your loved ones would likely jump at the chance to care for you the way you care for them. Don’t be ashamed to ask for the emotional support you need! If you have complicated feelings about these issues stemming from childhood, consider talking to a therapist. They can help you process and heal. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Black Moon Lilith is a calculated point along the moon’s orbit.
steps.content: Black Moon Lilith is a calculated point along the moon’s orbit. The moon orbits the Earth in an elliptical shape, so there are times when it's farther away than others. Black Moon Lilith is located at the point along this orbit when the moon is furthest away from Earth, also called the lunar apogee. [7] X Research source

steps.title: In your astrological chart, Black Moon Lilith reveals your shadow side.
steps.content: In your astrological chart, Black Moon Lilith reveals your shadow side. It represents the parts of yourself that you hide from the world because you’re afraid people wouldn’t understand. It also illuminates the repressed desires you’re meant to confront and express. [8] X Research source Embracing your Lilith is the key to shadow work , gaining freedom, and becoming your true self. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Black Moon Lilith gets its name from Lilith, Adam’s first wife.
steps.content: Black Moon Lilith gets its name from Lilith, Adam’s first wife. According to Jewish mythology, Lilith was the first woman, created even before Eve. She was made to be Adam’s wife, but she rebelled, instead claiming her sovereignty and independence. At first, Lilith was depicted as wild, untameable, and even demonic. In modern times, however, feminists have reclaimed Lilith’s legacy and embraced her as a symbol of autonomy and dark feminine energy. [10] X Research source These powerful associations carry over into the astrological meaning of Black Moon Lilith. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Cancers are warm, empathetic, and maternal.
steps.content: Cancers are warm, empathetic, and maternal. They are naturally nurturing and care deeply about their home and family lives. Like all water signs, Cancers feel their emotions intensely, and they’re known for being very sensitive and sentimental. Ruled by the moon, Cancers are also incredibly intuitive, and they often possess psychic abilities.
